problem_text:
b) Do there exist finitely generated branch groups that are non-amenable and do not contain the free group F2 on two generators?
L. Bartholdi, R. I. Grigorchuk, Z. Šunić
answer: b) Yes, there exist finitely generated non-amenable torsion branch groups (S. Kionke, E. Schesler, Bull. London Math. Soc., 56, no. 2 (2024), 536–550).
